info.description: `LitPAD API built with Fiber and GORM`
info.title: LITPAD API

get.description: Retrieves a list of books with support for pagination and optional filtering based on book title.

parameters.description: Title of the book to filter by
parameters.name: title

get.description: Retrieves a list of user profiles with support for pagination and optional filtering based on user account type.

parameters.description: Type of user to filter by (all, reader, writer)
parameters.name: type

parameters.description: Limit number of user profiles per page (default is 10)
parameters.name: limit

200.description: Successfully retrieved list of user profiles

post.description:
`This endpoint generates new access and refresh tokens for authentication via facebook`
`Pass in token gotten from facebook client authentication here in payload to retrieve tokens for authorization`

`This endpoint generates new access and refresh tokens for authentication via google`
`Pass in token gotten from gsi client authentication here in payload to retrieve tokens for authorization`
This endpoint generates new access and refresh tokens for authentication

get.description: This endpoint logs a user out from our application

post.description: This endpoint refresh tokens by generating new access and refresh tokens for a user
`This endpoint registers new users into our application.`
`This endpoint resends new otp to the user's email.`
`This endpoint sends new password reset link to the user's email.`
`This endpoint verifies the password reset token and set new password.`

get.description: `This endpoint checks the validity of a password reset token.`
This endpoint views a latest books

post.description: This endpoint allows a writer to create a book

get.description: This endpoint views a latest books by an author
get.summary: View Latest Books By A Particular Author

get.description: This endpoint views a single book with all chapters
get.summary: View Single Book (All chapters - For The Author and User who has bought it)

put.description:
`This endpoint allows a writer to update a chapter in his/her book`
`Chapter status: DRAFT, PUBLISHED, TRASH`
put.summary: Update A Chapter of a Book

delete.description: This endpoint allows a writer to delete a chapter from a book

get.description: This endpoint views a single book

put.description: This endpoint allows a writer to update a book

delete.description: This endpoint allows a writer to delete a book

post.description:
`This endpoint allows a writer to add a chapter to his/her book`
`Chapter status: DRAFT, PUBLISHED, TRASH`
post.summary: Add A Chapter to a Book

get.description: This endpoint allows a user to buy a book
This endpoint views all books bought by a user
This endpoint views available book genres
This endpoint views available book tags
This endpoint retrieves few details of the site/application.

post.description: This endpoint creates a newsletter subscriber in our application

get.description: This endpoint shows a user gifts that can be sent
This endpoint allows a writer to view all gifts that was sent to him/her
get.summary: View All Gifts Sent To A Writer

parameters.description: Filter by claimed value: CLAIMED or NOT_CLAIMED
parameters.name: claimed

get.description: This endpoint allows a writer to claim a gift
This endpoint allows a user to send a gift

parameters.description: Slug of the gift being sent
parameters.name: gift_slug

get.description: This endpoint checks the health of our application.
This endpoint allows a user to view his/her notificatios

post.description: This endpoint allows a user to read his/her notification.

get.description: This endpoint views a user profile
`This endpoint allows a user to follow or unfollow a writer`.

parameters.description: Username of the user to follow or unfollow
parameters.name: username

400.description: Returns an error for invalid request parameters.

403.description: Returns an error when trying to follow a user that isn't a writer

404.description: Returns an error when either the user to follow or the follower user does not exist.

500.description: Returns an error when there is an internal server error or a transaction fails.

patch.description: This endpoint updates a user's profile

put.description: This endpoint updates a user's password

get.description: This endpoint returns all available coins for sale

post.description: This endpoint allows a user to buy coins

get.description: This endpoint returns all transactions of a user

book.description: Bought book, vote, comment and reply

BearerAuth.description: Type 'Bearer jwt_string' to correctly set the API Key
BearerAuth.name: Authorization
